brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this study was to determine the prevalence rate and risk factors for chemical
      laboratory clopidogrel low-response (CLR) in the acute phase after an ischemic stroke.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clopidogrel Response in Acute Ischemic Stroke

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  acute ischemic stroke

          -  admittance to stroke unit

          -  clopidogrel medication

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  no consent

          -  prior bleeding disorders

          -  severe liver disorders

          -  current gastrointestinal disorders

          -  congestive heart failure

          -  life-threatening malignancies

study_pop.textblock:
Patients with an acute ischemic stroke admitted to our hospital and treated with
        clopidogrel

clinical_study.official_title: Prevalence of Low Response to Clopidogrel in Patients After Acute Ischemic Stroke. The Bochumer CRISP Study

overall_official.affiliation: Ruhr University Bochum, Department of Neurology

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
